Dear Bill:
Yes, we do share with you in the conclusion that our funds
granted to the NAEB have been very effectively used. We shall look
forward to reading the final reports which you are to submit. And
we hope to be kept informed concerning the progress of your AssociaÂ¬
tion.
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
